short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A super handy QR Code Create / Creator for you.
short.vi: Trình tạo / tạo mã QR siêu tiện dụng cho bạn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A super handy QR Code Creator for you.
Converts your current page into a QR Code with one quick click.
Generates QR Codes from free text, and URLs on the fly.
The highest-rated QR Code Creator in the Chrome Web Store.

Key Features:

✓ Generate a QR Code of your current page with just one click.
✓ Free for everyone. 
✓ Scan/Analyze/Decode/Read QR Codes: Settings » Advanced.
✓ Realtime QR Code creating: Just type.
✓ Right-click to create a QR Code for your selection.
✓ Color and size customization.
✓ Available to download the QR Code as an image.
✓ Super fast and works offline.
✓ Print your QR Code directly.
